title: Carpet Diem
description: Good and Evil do not exist.God and Satan are brother and sister, and the Big Bang was a giant cockup.Now, over 13 billion years later, the most important item in all of creation is Simon Debovar's living room carpet. And someone just stole it.Can Simon overcome his anti-social nature and recover his carpet before it costs him his life?And, more importantly, should he?Brace yourself for a witty, sexy, sweary romp through a world of angels, demons, witches, immortals and talking deer. Join Simon and his alcoholic, foul-mouthed Great Aunt Harriet as they stumble their way from one near disaster to the next, with the fate of the world at stake.
author: Justin Lee Anderson
